titleStmt.title: The great doctrines of the gospel of Christ owned, believed and asserted in several declarations or sermons preached in London, by sundry servants of Christ of the society of Christian Quakers.
titleStmt.author: Budd, Thomas, 1648-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Nath. Crouch, at the Bell in the Poultry, near Cheap-side,

notesStmt.note: With two final leaves of advertisements.
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2473 lacks the two final advertisement leaves.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
